actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
